channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- ZTE WF820+ LTE Outdoor CPE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- ZTE WF820+ LTE Outdoor CPE

item.title: CVE-2019-3409|2024-08-04T19:12:08.566Z -- zte -- zte%20wf820%2B%20lte%20outdoor%20cpe
item.description: All versions up to UKBB_WF820+_1.0.0B06 of ZTE WF820+ LTE Outdoor CPE product are impacted by command injection vulnerability. Due to inadequate parameter verification, unauthorized users can take advantage of this vulnerability to control the user terminal system.

item.title: CVE-2019-3410|2024-08-04T19:12:08.564Z -- zte -- zte%20wf820%2B%20lte%20outdoor%20cpe
item.description: All versions up to UKBB_WF820+_1.0.0B06 of ZTE WF820+ LTE Outdoor CPE product are impacted by Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability,which stems from the fact that WEB applications do not adequately verify whether requests come from trusted users. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to send unexpected requests to the server through the affected client.
